text: Colchester Royal Grammar School (CRGS) is a grammar school in Colchester. It was started by Master John and Joseph Elianore in 1206. Since 2006 it has had the best A-level results in the country every year. 100% of students get 5 A*-C GCSEs including English and Maths. ==References== Category:Grammar schools in England Category:1206 establishments in Europe Category:13th- century establishments in England Category:Organisations based in Essex Category:Colchester
title: Colchester Royal Grammar School
